No.-25664)} Sub: Re-constitution of Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) to inquire into complaints related to Sexual Harassment of Women Employees of NHAI at Workplace reg: In partial modification of NHAI's Policy Circular No. 1.7.1.20/2023 dated December , 2023, it has been decided with approval of the Competent Authority to re- constitute the Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) of NHAI with the following composition to inquire into complaints related to Sexual Harassment of Women Employees of NHAI at work place in accordance with the provisions of Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013 [PoSH Act, 2013]: () Smt. Akta Kumari, GM (Tech:) Presiding Officer (ii) Shri P_ K. Mohapatra, GM (IT) Member (iii) Ms. Rashmi Malhotra External Member {Chairperson & TOF of Om Foundation; Address: H-367 , 3rd Naraina Vihar , New Delhi- 110028, Contact No. 9810174489 , 9350201089 and E-mail ID: the.0m1935@gmailcom; theompatrika@gmaiLcom} (iv) Shri Krishan Dalal, DGM (HR/Admin:) Member Smt. Madhavi Sridhar Y.= DGM (HR/Admin:) Member Secretary The composition of the Committee may be modified from time to time, as per requirement, by the Office Memorandum_ 2 In accordance with the Dept: of Personnel & Training OM No.11013/3/2009-Estt: (A) dated 2.2.2009 (as amended from time to time), for inquiring into complaints made against Officers of the level of Secretary and Additional Secretary and equivalent level in the Government of India in the Ministries/ Departments and Organizations directly under control of the Central Government (other than Central PUs) , a Complaints Committee has been constituted vide Cabinet Secretariat's Order No.1 dated 26.09.2008 (as amended from time to time)_ The Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) referred in para 1 above will, therefore, inquire into complaints of Sexual Harassment against only those Government Servants, who are not covered by the Cabinet Secretariat's Order No.1 dated 26.09.2008 (as amended from time to time): 3_ The Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) of NHAI will follow the instructions issued by the Deptt: of Personnel & Training from time to time and the provisions of PoSH Act, 2013 for its functioning: Contd__2I- '4779 NHAL 10, 27th Floor ,
